events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified the customer's issue as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Customer support agent Jane Doe has been assigned to handle this refund case.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund because you received the wrong item.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the wrong item sent to me along with my order number 123456789.
We will initiate the refund immediately and arrange a free pickup for the incorrect item at your convenience.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the free pickup and prompt refund process.
The refund has been processed, and the pickup has been scheduled for tomorrow between 10 AM and 12 PM.
We are following up to confirm that you received the refund and that the pickup was successful.
Everything worked perfectly. The refund is in my account and the pickup went smoothly. Thank you!
Closing case as the refund has been successfully processed and all customer concerns have been addressed.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience.
